name: Super Gem'Z
overview: A mixture between Gem'X, Kaiko's previous game, and Bomberman, your goal in Super Gem'Z is to collect and return Her Majesty's Crown Jewels stolen by a master thief. Dozens of levels, power-ups, and colorful anime makes this a highly underrated classic. The Amiga master was stolen from Kaiko at a Cologne computer fair in 1992 and Software 2000 refused to still publish it. There also exists a conversion for the PC; yet even this one has never been published.
